landing.title: EGS Tutoring Portal
landing.subtitle: Your home for simple, stress-free learning support
landing.allInOnePlace: Everything You Need in One Place
landing.footerText: Access your tutoring dashboard and manage everything in one centralized location.

scheduling.title: Session Scheduling
scheduling.description: Optionally plan and organize your tutoring sessions with an integrated calendar system that syncs across all devices for better time management.

requests.title: Tutoring Requests
requests.description: Receive and respond to new tutoring requests from parents, all organized in one convenient location.

reports.title: Progress Tracking
reports.description: Generate detailed monthly reports and track student progress with comprehensive analytics and insights.

communication.title: Communication Between Parents and Tutors
communication.description: Build trust through transparency and constant support. Parents and tutors stay connected via clear progress tracking and dispute resolution features.

invoicing.title: Invoice Management
invoicing.description: Track hours worked, generate professional invoices, and manage payments seamlessly through Stripe integration.

aiSupport.title: AI Assistant
aiSupport.description: Get instant help with tutoring questions and lesson planning through our integrated ChatGPT assistant.

benefits.unified: All tutoring tools unified in one comprehensive dashboard
benefits.support: 24/7 active support and regular platform updates
benefits.realTime: Real-time notifications and updates for parents and tutors
benefits.secure: Secure data handling with encrypted communications
benefits.mobile: Mobile-responsive design for access anywhere, anytime
benefits.efficient: Streamlined workflows that save time and reduce administrative burden

landing.stepsSubtitle: Follow these simple steps to get your child connected with the perfect tutor:

step1.title: Create Accounts
step1.description: Register an account for yourself, then create student accounts for your children through your parent dashboard.

step2.title: Request a Tutor
step2.description: Submit a tutoring request specifying your child's grade, subject needs, and preferred learning format (online or in-person).

step3.title: Review Replies
step3.description: Check the Current Requests page to see tutor responses, compare qualifications, and accept the best fit for your child.

monthlyReports.title: Monthly Reports
monthlyReports.reportError: Error submitting report. Please try again.
monthlyReports.parentDescription: View monthly progress reports submitted by your children's tutors. Reports are only created when tutors have taught at least 3 hours in a month.
monthlyReports.overallProgressQuestion: How would you describe the child's progress this month?
monthlyReports.overallProgressPlaceholder: Describe the student's overall progress, improvements, and development this month...
monthlyReports.strengthsQuestion: What subject areas or skills has the child improved in or shown strong ability?
monthlyReports.strengthsPlaceholder: List specific subjects, skills, or areas where the student excels...
monthlyReports.challengesQuestion: What areas still need extra support or practice?
monthlyReports.challengesPlaceholder: Identify areas that need more attention or practice...
monthlyReports.workHabitsQuestion: How is the child's focus, participation, and effort during tutoring sessions?
monthlyReports.workHabitsPlaceholder: Describe the student's focus, engagement, and work ethic during sessions...
monthlyReports.confidenceQuestion: Do you notice any changes in the child's confidence or attitude toward learning?
monthlyReports.confidencePlaceholder: Note any changes in confidence, attitude, or mindset toward learning...
monthlyReports.homeworkQuestion: How consistent has the child been with completing assignments or practicing skills outside of tutoring?
monthlyReports.homeworkPlaceholder: Describe homework completion, practice consistency, and independent work...
monthlyReports.parentSupportQuestion: Is there anything parents can do at home to reinforce learning?
monthlyReports.parentSupportPlaceholder: Suggest specific activities, resources, or ways parents can help at home...
monthlyReports.lookingAheadQuestion: What will be the main focus for the next month?
monthlyReports.lookingAheadPlaceholder: Outline goals, topics, and focus areas for the upcoming month...
monthlyReports.insufficientHoursAlert: Insufficient hours. You need 4+ hours logged to submit a report.
monthlyReports.failedToLoadStudentsStatus: Failed to load students report status
monthlyReports.instructions: Monthly reports are due for students with 4+ hours worked in {{month}}. Click on a student to fill out their report.
monthlyReports.pendingReportsDescription: These students need monthly reports submitted. Reports are due on the 1st of each month for the previous month.
monthlyReports.notRequiredDescription: These students had less than 4 hours logged in {{month}}, so reports are not required.
monthlyReports.noStudentsAssigned: You don't have any students assigned yet.
monthlyReports.parentViewDescription: View monthly progress reports for your children. Tutors submit reports when they've worked 4+ hours with a student in a month.
monthlyReports.noReportsYet: No reports have been submitted yet. Tutors submit reports when they've worked 4+ hours with your child in a month.

students.addStudentDescription: This will create a separate login account for your child, allowing them to log in independently if they wish. You only need to provide their name, a username, and password. Their address, city, and phone number will automatically match yours.
students.usernameHelp: Minimum 3 characters. Your child will use this username to log in to their own account.
students.passwordHelp: Minimum 6 characters. This is the password your child will use to log in.
students.autoFillDescription: The following will be automatically copied from your parent account: address, city, and phone number.
students.pleaseProvideNames: Please provide first and last name.
students.usernameRequired: Username must be at least 3 characters.
students.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.

tour.welcome: Welcome to your EGS Tutoring dashboard! Let's take a quick tour of the key features.
tour.weeklyHours: Here you can see your logged hours for the current week.
tour.tutorCode: This is your personal tutor referral code. Share it with new students to connect directly!
tour.loggedHours: View all your logged tutoring sessions here. Click 'View More' to see full details in My Hours page, where you can dispute hours if needed.
tour.announcements: Stay updated with important announcements from EGS Tutoring.
tour.scheduledEvents: View your upcoming tutoring sessions here. Click 'View More' to see all sessions in the Upcoming Sessions page.
tour.myStudents: MY STUDENTS - View all students assigned to you. See their names, parent contact info, and subjects you're tutoring. This is your central hub for managing student relationships.
tour.tutoringRequests: TUTORING REQUESTS - Browse new parent requests looking for tutors. Filter by subject, grade, location, and service type. Reply to requests that match your expertise and availability.
tour.myHours: MY HOURS - Log tutoring sessions here. Record date, time, student, subject, and session notes. View all your logged hours, edit entries, or dispute hours if needed. Track your weekly and monthly totals.
tour.upcomingSessions: UPCOMING SESSIONS - See all your scheduled tutoring sessions. View session details, manage your availability, and update your RSVP. Mark if you can't attend to notify parents.
tour.invoices: INVOICES - View all your payment invoices. See paid and unpaid invoices, download PDF receipts, track payment status, and monitor your earnings from tutoring sessions.
tour.monthlyReports: MONTHLY REPORTS - Submit progress reports for students you've tutored 4+ hours in a month. Document student progress, strengths, challenges, work habits, and goals. Parents read these to track their child's development.
tour.students: MY STUDENTS - View all your children's accounts. See who their assigned tutors are, request new tutors, or request tutor changes. Access each child's tutoring history and progress reports.
tour.parentTutoringRequests: TUTORING REQUESTS - Request a tutor for your child by specifying grade, subject, and preferred service type (online/in-person). View responses from interested tutors, compare qualifications, and accept the best match.
tour.viewInvoices: INVOICES - View all tutoring invoices for your children. See amounts due, due dates, and payment history. Click invoices to pay online securely through Stripe. Download receipts for paid invoices.
tour.reportsParent: MONTHLY REPORTS - Read detailed progress reports from your children's tutors. Reports include overall progress, strengths, areas for improvement, work habits, confidence changes, and recommendations for home support.
tour.studentScheduledEvents: Check your upcoming tutoring sessions here.
tour.studentEvents: EVENTS - View all your scheduled tutoring sessions. See dates, times, tutors, and session details. Check when your next sessions are and stay organized with your tutoring schedule.
tour.notifications: View important updates, session reminders, and payment notifications.
tour.recentRequests: See the latest tutoring requests and respond to them. Click 'View More' to see all requests.
tour.paymentTransfers: Track your payment history and upcoming transfers here.
tour.tutorDocuments: Upload and manage important documents like certifications and lesson plans.
tour.tutorStudents: View detailed information about your current students. Click a student name to see their profile.
tour.paymentProgress: Track your payment progress here. The green bar shows how much of your invoices have been paid. Click to see all invoices in the Invoices page.
tour.paidInvoices: View your paid invoices here. Click on an invoice to download the PDF. Click 'View More' to see all invoices in the Invoices page.
tour.unpaidInvoices: View unpaid invoices here. Click on an invoice to pay it online. Click 'View More' to see all invoices in the Invoices page.
